'''2.2.3965''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.3964''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.3963''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on August 2, 2021.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-17454}} - Can't add skins to library.
* {{Bug|MCL-17557}} - Holding {{key|windows}} & clicking on buttons in the MCL.
* {{Bug|MCL-18214}} - Minecraft launcher does not work, and logged "Sorry, something went terribly wrong and you probably encountered a bug".
